vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.2;
father of: Jashobeam (H3434)
§ Zabdiel = "God is my endowment"
1) father of Jashobeam, the chief of David's guard
2) a priest in Nehemiah's time
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Jasobeam, oficial del ejército; en tiempos de David; (b)   hijo de Guedolim; sacerdote; en tiempos de Nehemías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒巴第業 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝是我的基業"
1) 大衛王守衛的領導人雅朔班的父親 (代上27:2)
2) 尼希米時期一個祭司 (尼11:14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒巴第业 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝是我的基业"
1) 大卫王守卫的领导人雅朔班的父亲 (代上27:2)
2) 尼希米时期一个祭司 (尼11:14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.14;
son of: Haggedolim (H1419B)
§ Zabdiel = "God is my endowment"
1) father of Jashobeam, the chief of David's guard
2) a priest in Nehemiah's time
